Package permafrost.tundra.server.http.handler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Handler
    Handles HTTP requests.
    Identifier
    Adds an HTTP header to the HTTP response with a unique request ID to support log correlation.
    Identifier.Holder
    Initialization on demand holder idiom.
    Kernel
    Proxies HTTP requests to the HTTPHandler object registered for the request directive.
    Logger
    Logs HTTP requests and responses to a log file.
    Logger.Holder
    Initialization on demand holder idiom.
    Manager
    The HTTP request manager.
    Manager.Holder
    Initialization on demand holder idiom.
    Measurer
    Adds an HTTP header to the HTTP response with the measured duration of the request processing.
    Measurer.Holder
    Initialization on demand holder idiom.
    StartableHandler
    An HTTP handler which can be started and stopped.
